mapper.select: SELECT m.id, r.id AS roleId, p.id AS permissionId, r.code AS roleCode, p.code AS permissionCode FROM sys_role_permission AS m LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id=m.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission as p ON p.id=m.permission_id WHERE r.id IN (SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id=#{id})
